attributes.action: To abolish the new road tax prices on existing cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the new road tax charges coming into effect April 2009 is unfair and unjust to include existing cars. It will increase an unnecessary burden on families etc that are already struggling.

The chancellor should only introduce the tax on new cars, thus giving a choice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
